attributes.description: Analyze the status of your current STIG scans run against your endpoints.

params.markdown:
| CCRI Score | Description |
| :------------ | :------------ |
| 20-100% | Critical Concern |
| 10-20% | Moderate Concern |
| 0-10% | Minor Concern |
| 0% | No Concern |

embeddableConfig.description: Passes and Fails broken down by the rule severity level.
By host breakdown of failing STIG checks and the sum of their score.

action.name: View Benchmark Results for this Endpoint

embeddableConfig.description: TYCHON continuously reports the status of STIG results, this is the history of those results.

attributes.title: [TYCHON] STIG Report Dashboard
